text: un logon ne to apane khuda ko chhodakar apanee aalimon ko aur apane zaahidon ko aur mariyam ke bete maseeh ko apana paravaradigaar bana daala haaloki unhonen sivae isake aur hukm hee nahin diya gaya ki khudae yaqata (sirf khuda) kee ibaadat karen usake siva (aur koee qaabile parasatish nahin)
